sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const translations = { tr: { siteTitle: 'Caffe Soso', heroTitle: 'Hoşgeldiniz — Caffe Soso', heroSubtitle: 'Kalite, sade sunum ve sıcak servis.', aboutTitle: 'Hakkımızda', aboutText: 'Tek merkezli, küçük ve özenli bir kafe markasıyız. Tüm içeriklerimiz yerel kalite standartlarına göre hazırlanır.', hrTitle: 'İnsan Kaynakları', hrText: 'Açık pozisyonlar ve işe alım süreçleri için lütfen aşağıdaki e-posta adresine başvurun. CV/ön yazı gönderiniz.', contactTitle: 'İletişim', contactPhone: '+90 216 567 7 567', contactEmail: 'info@caffesoso.com', address: 'İstanbul — Tek Merkez', applyButton: 'Başvuruyu Gönder', downloadMenu: 'Menü (PDF)', navHome: 'Anasayfa', navHR: 'İK', navContact: 'İletişim' }, en: { siteTitle: 'Caffe Soso', heroTitle: 'Welcome — Caffe Soso', heroSubtitle: 'Quality, simplicity and warm service.', aboutTitle: 'About Us', aboutText: "We're a single-location, carefully-run café. Everything is prepared to local quality standards.", hrTitle: 'Human Resources', hrText: 'For open positions and recruitment, please send your CV and cover letter to the email below.', contactTitle: 'Contact', contactPhone: '+90 216 567 7 567', contactEmail: 'info@caffesoso.com', address: 'Istanbul — Single Location', applyButton: 'Send Application', downloadMenu: 'Menu (PDF)', navHome: 'Home', navHR: 'HR', navContact: 'Contact' }, de: { siteTitle: 'Caffe Soso', heroTitle: 'Willkommen — Caffe Soso', heroSubtitle: 'Qualität, Schlichtheit und herzlicher Service.', aboutTitle: 'Über Uns', aboutText: 'Wir sind ein einzelner Standort, sorgfältig geführtes Café. Alles wird nach lokalen Qualitätsstandards zubereitet.', hrTitle: 'Personal', hrText: 'Für offene Stellen und Bewerbungsverfahren senden Sie bitte Ihren Lebenslauf und ein Anschreiben an die folgende E-Mail-Adresse.', contactTitle: 'Kontakt', contactPhone: '+90 216 567 7 567', contactEmail: 'info@caffesoso.com', address: 'Istanbul — Ein Standort', applyButton: 'Bewerbung senden', downloadMenu: 'Menü (PDF)', navHome: 'Start', navHR: 'Personal', navContact: 'Kontakt' } }; export default function App() { const [lang, setLang] = useState('tr'); const t = translations[lang]; const scrollToId = id => { const el = document.getElementById(id); if (el) el.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }; return (
{t.siteTitle}
{t.address}
{t.downloadMenu}
{/* Hero & About Section */}

{t.heroTitle}

{t.heroSubtitle}

{t.contactEmail} {t.contactPhone}

* Tek merkez — franchise yok.

{t.aboutTitle}

{t.aboutText}

{t.downloadMenu}
{/* HR Section */}

{t.hrTitle}

{t.hrText}

{ e.preventDefault(); const form = e.target; const name = form.name.value; const email = form.email.value; const message = form.message.value; const mailto = `mailto:${t.contactEmail}?subject=${encodeURIComponent(`${name} - İş başvurusu`)}&body=${encodeURIComponent(`${message}\n\nEmail: ${email}`)}`; window.location.href = mailto; }}>
